files.patch:
@@ -236,1 +236,1 @@
-    // we need to set the locals now so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call
+    // we need to set the locals so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call

@@ -823,1 +823,1 @@
-  // Now &fp()[rscratch1] == rlocals
+  // Store relativized rlocals, see frame::interpreter_frame_locals().

@@ -659,2 +659,1 @@
-  // Now &fp()[Rtemp] == Rlocals
-  __ push(Rtemp);                                      // set relativized locals
+  __ push(Rtemp);                                      // set relativized Rlocals, see frame::interpreter_frame_locals()

@@ -508,1 +508,1 @@
-    // we need to set the locals now so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call
+    // we need to set the locals so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call

@@ -856,1 +856,1 @@
-    __ ld(Robj_to_lock, _abi0(callers_sp), R1_SP); // Sets Robj_to_lock = fp.
+    __ ld(Robj_to_lock, _abi0(callers_sp), R1_SP);
@@ -1035,1 +1035,1 @@
-  // Now &fp()[R12_scratch2] == R18_locals
+  // Store relativized R18_locals, see frame::interpreter_frame_locals().

@@ -239,1 +239,1 @@
-    // we need to set the locals now so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call
+    // we need to set the locals so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call

@@ -759,1 +759,1 @@
-  // Now &fp()[t0] == xlocals
+  // Store relativized xlocals, see frame::interpreter_frame_locals().

@@ -224,1 +224,1 @@
-    // we need to set the locals now so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call
+    // we need to set the locals so that the caller of new_stack_frame() can call

@@ -651,2 +651,1 @@
-  // Now &fp()[rax] == rlocals
-  __ push(rax); // set relativized locals
+  __ push(rax); // set relativized rlocals, see frame::interpreter_frame_locals()
